name: Basic Haircut
description: A classic, clean cut tailored to your style. Includes a consultation and precision styling.

name: Basic Lineup
description: Crisp edging of the hairline and beard to keep you looking sharp between full haircuts.

name: Bald Fade
description: Smooth transition from skin to hair. A modern, high-contrast look executed with precision.

name: Taper Fade + Beard
description: A stylish taper fade combined with expert beard grooming and shaping.

name: Drop Fade
description: A fade that drops behind the ear for a unique, contoured profile.

name: Beard Trim
description: Professional trimming and shaping to maintain your beard's health and style.
